name: SEO Landing Page Generator
author: IntellaSoft Solutions

sections.description:
The SEO Landing Page Generator lets you automatically generate thousands of location specific landing pages, with the help of template pages. Just create a template page, pick which of the 50,000 US cities you need a landing pages for and the plugin creates them automatically based on the content of the template page. The template page content can be filled with location shortcodes that will be replaced with location specific information when a landing page is rendered, to make the text specific to a cities landing page.

But that’s not all. You can also add content and images for each individual landing page if you like. The plugin also works with the SEO Content Randomizer, a plugin that lets you randomize content. This way you can make sure that no two landing pages look the same. XML and HTML sitemaps are automatically created as well.

See a demo here

Features

  • Build thousands of city specific landing pages within minutes
  • Location specific shortcodes for marketing
  • Upload local images
  • Setup landing pages for large market cities with location specific content
  • Automatically generate XML and HTML sitemaps
  • Easy to use settings panel

Premium Features

The Pro and Enterprise versions of the plugin allow you to create landing pages for cities in more than 1 county.

  • Get the SEO Landing Page Generator Pro version here to be able create landing pages for cities in up to 10 counties.
  • Get the SEO Landing Page Generator Enterprise version here to be able create landing pages for all counties in the United States.

Affiliate Marketing

If you like the plugin, check out our Affiliate Marketing Program for the Pro and Enterprise version.

Further Information

  • See the How-To videos
  • Read the Documentation
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. In the admin dashboard, go to “Plugins > Add New”.
  2. Search for “SEO Landing Page Generator”.
  3. Install and activate the plugin.

Manually

  1. Download the plugin.
  2. Login to your WordPress site’s admin dashboard.
  3. In the admin dashboard, go to “Plugins > Add New”.
  4. Click the “Upload Plugin” button at the top of the page.
  5. Click the “Choose File” button and select the plugin file you’ve just downloaded.
  6. Click the “Install Now” button.
  7. Once the plugin is installed successfully, click the “Activate Plugin” button.
sections.faq:
What is a Landing Page?

Landing pages are generated based on the cities you activated in the plugin\’s settings panel and the template pages you create. So if a template page has the name \”My Service\” and the city Troy in Michigan is activated, one landing page that will be created will be named \”My Service in Troy, Michigan\”. The landing page will contain the content you entered on the template page and fill the placeholders with information specific to Troy in Michigan.

What is a Template Page?

As the name suggests, template pages are used as templates for landing pages and promote services you offer. You write quality content once on the template page, and use placeholders in the text that will be filled in with location specific text when a visitor opens a landing page. Updating content on the template page automatically updates all the correlating landing pages too.
sections.screenshots:
1. Promote a service on a template page and add location placeholders

  2. Landing pages are automatically created based on template pages and active locations

  3. Location placeholders are filled in on the landing page and location specific content is displayed

  4. Active cities and correlating landing pages will be automatically created

  5. Enter a default phone number and toggle content panel visibility
sections.reviews:
Non-existent Support

By fencefinders on September 16, 2023

Deactivated and removed the pro/paid version in May, 2023, chose to cancel the paid account at that time. I have been billed $59 per month since may, it's now September. Have sent multiple emails, no reply, no cancellation. Don't use this plugin if you ever plan on cancelling or having any type of customer support.

Waste of time. It is very hard to use.

By guajiram on December 16, 2022

Waste of time. It is very hard to use. You can write your own articles instead of struggling to make the configurations and settings of this plugin.

Impressive results!

By (amsweb1) on February 25, 2021

Really impressed with how soon we were seeing results on the first page of Google!

Amazing plugin and outstanding support!

By amsruven on February 24, 2021

This plugin is truly amazing. After watching the video docs, I was able to create over 2000 city landing pages for 4 services in 3 different states that all have different content (thanks to the Randomizer plugin from the same author). My sites ranking on Google has massively improved and I'm getting more and more business. Thank you!!

short_description: Generate landing pages in bulk based on location with randomized content. Update thousands of landing pages in seconds.
